hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\purpleD5$ hundreds, $\purpleD7$ tens, and $\purpleD0$ ones so, our first addend is $\purpleD{570}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/53c9254ac48e4b7420d0cb31aaa635a02b55f037)

The second set of blocks shows $\maroonD3$ hundreds, $\maroonD8$ tens, and $\maroonD2$ ones so, our second addend is $\maroonD{382}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/184982733dc23afbc30069a12f8a54608fc0cf52)

We can put our two numbers together on the place value chart.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/6744d486698174ed36d17ac22d4d8d7fd98edfc5)

There are $8\text{ hundreds}, 15\text{ tens}$ and $2\text{ ones}$.

Now we can take our $15\text{ tens}$ and make $1\text{ hundred}$ and $5\text{ tens}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/93c8bba8474560b44247328848fa0e16880305cd)

Together, there are $\blueE9$ hundreds, $\blueE5$ tens, and $\blueE2$ ones.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/05b4ee7a6ef34039f1ed81409e7dac0d325f5cc9)

$900 + 50 + 2 =\blueE{952}$

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$\purpleE{570} + \maroonD{382} = \blueE{952}$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented by the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/7009748d59ce119e505ef353f1d8b131f135d82f)

[[☃ radio 1]]
